players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Oh no, Alice is gone! We need to be careful and figure this out together."
You: "Let's investigate Diana first to see if she is a detective, as this could give us an idea of the mafioso's presence in our group."
Diana: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. Charlie is the mafioso. We must vote for Charlie."
Diana: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie. He is the mafioso. We must vote him out to win."
Charlie: "Diana is lying! I'm the real detective and I investigated Bob last night. Bob is innocent. Diana must be the mafioso trying to frame me."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
